channel.title: CNET UK Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: CNET UK Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Britain's best technology podcast is beamed to your auditory sensors every Friday afternoon direct from CNET UK. The honey-toned team give you everything you need to know about the week's hottest tech news, the most Crave-worthy new gadgets and answer your best questions and funniest comments. There's a special feature every week, in which we tackle a burning tech topic in more detail, and lots more fun besides. Subscribe now, and let us know what you think!
channel.itunes:author: CNET UK
channel.itunes:keywords: cnet uk, crave, mobile phones, technology, gadgets, electronics, games, apple, cent uk, carve
